dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Comprehensive overview of your business
dashboard.description: Intelligent command center that provides a panoramic, real-time view of your entire professional operation. The dashboard integrates data from multiple sources to present consolidated insights about performance, productivity, and profitability. Monitor essential indicators like total hours worked, active clients, pending invoices, and revenue. Quickly access recent work, identify your top clients, and track weekly progress and monthly growth. Use interactive widgets to navigate directly to important actions like adding hours or creating invoices. The adaptive panel automatically highlights critical metrics and improvement opportunities, enabling quick and informed decision-making to optimize your time management and maximize financial results.

workHours.title: Work Hours
workHours.subtitle: Track and manage your work hours with precision
workHours.hourDescription: Professional time tracking system designed for precise tracking and intelligent management of work hours. The operational flow includes: client and project selection → date and duration registration → detailed activity descriptions → work type categorization → productivity and pattern analysis. Monitor essential metrics like total hours per period, estimated value based on hourly rates, work distribution between clients and active projects. Use advanced filters by date, client, or project for specific analyses. Export data for billing and maintain complete history for productivity reports and strategic planning.

clients.title: Clients
clients.subtitle: Manage your clients and their information
clients.description: Centralized client relationship management platform that organizes all essential information in a secure and accessible location. The complete flow includes: contact and business data registration → multiple address management (billing, delivery, office) → work and billing history tracking → personalized dashboard sharing → engagement and profitability analysis per client. Monitor valuable metrics like average hours per client, billing frequency, total paid and pending amounts. Use sharing features to send dashboards via WhatsApp or email, maintaining complete transparency. Analyze your client portfolio and identify growth opportunities through performance insights and business health metrics.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Organize your work by projects
projects.description: Complete project management system that allows you to structure and organize all your work professionally. Create specific projects for each client, define scope and objectives, and track progress in real-time. The flow includes: project creation linked to clients → work hours registration by project → productivity and profitability analysis → detailed report generation. Use advanced filters to view projects by status, client, or period, and monitor metrics like utilization rate, average hours per project, and work distribution among clients. Ideal for freelancers and consultants managing multiple simultaneous projects.

invoices.title: Invoices
invoices.subtitle: Create and manage your invoices
invoices.description: Comprehensive billing system that transforms your tracked work hours into professional billing documents and organized records. The operational flow includes: selection of registered work hours → automatic or manual invoice creation → supporting document upload (contracts, receipts) → payment status tracking → cash flow analysis. Manage the entire financial cycle with features like intelligent search by client, date or amount, status filters (paid/pending/cancelled), and financial performance insights. Monitor crucial metrics like billing rate, average invoice value, payment efficiency and revenue projections. Essential for maintaining your business financial health.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account settings and preferences
settings.description: Personalized control center to optimize your Its Done experience and tailor the system to your specific workflow. Configure intelligent work hour alerts to receive notifications when you reach monthly targets, avoiding billing surprises. The flow includes: hour limit definition → notification email configuration → language and theme preference customization → privacy settings adjustment. Automatically monitor your progress and receive strategic reminders to create invoices at the optimal time. Customize notifications, set productivity goals, and maintain complete control over when and how you receive important alerts for your freelance or consulting business.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.subtitle: Detailed analytics and advanced reports
analytics.description: Business intelligence dashboard that transforms your work data into strategic insights for growth and optimization. Visualize productivity patterns through interactive charts, compare performance across periods, and identify improvement opportunities. The analytical flow includes: automatic collection of hours and project data → performance metrics processing → visual report generation → trend and pattern analysis → data export for accounting. Monitor key indicators like client productivity, work seasonality, utilization rate, project profitability, and growth forecasts. Make data-driven decisions to maximize your efficiency and professional profitability.
